alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 22 at 9:58AM CDT until March 22 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BEAUREGARD AND CENTRAL ALLEN PARISHES... At 957 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harmony, or near Mittie, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oakdale, Oberlin, Reeves, Dry Creek, Mittie, Allen Parish Airport and Harmony. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for southwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
